Episodes.Title: Crash
Episodes.Plot: Premiere. Axel investigates a K-Town murder. Officers Kenny and Bebe collide with a mysterious woman. Ben (Dennis Hopper) hires a limo driver from South Central. And Christine insists that her father move in.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Fairman, John Walcutt, Emily Foxler, Chris Maher, Cynthia Ruffin, Tom Wright, Kelvin Han Yee, Loren Hayes, D.B. Sweeney

Episodes.Title: The Doctor Is In
Episodes.Plot: Christine and Peter argue about the remodel of the bathroom, while Lou complains about his nurse. Anthony can?t quite understand Ben?s unusual friendship with the doctor. And Axel?s investigation gets complicated, as he takes steps to insure that Eddie doesn?t share his knowledge of the K-Town murders.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Panic
Episodes.Plot: The cops investigate a shooting of one of their own. Christine is taken with her new architect. Ben gives Anthony a shot at the big time. And a young Guatemalan man begins his perilous journey to the U.S.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Railroaded
Episodes.Plot: Ben's doctor takes a tumble, but Eddie turns up to help. Anthony samples the show business lifestyle. Kenny's obsession affects his marriage. And Christine wonders if she's taken on too much.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Your Ass Belongs to the Gypsies
Episodes.Plot: A wildfire rages near Peter's failing development. Kenny digs a deeper hole, bending the law to make a problem go away. And Ben's life takes an unexpected and traumatic turn.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use and sexual material

Episodes.Title: Clusterfuck
Episodes.Plot: Megan sneaks out with Charles, and Christine and Peter have a blazing row. Annoyed with Ben, Anthony hooks up with an old gang buddy. And Kenny and Bebe interrupt a hold-up at Roger's barbershop.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use and sexual material

Episodes.Title: Los Muertos
Episodes.Plot: Ben makes a reluctant Anthony drive him deep into the desert to see his shaman. Cesar takes his first steps on American soil, only to be faced with relentless hunger, thirst and endless desert.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use and sexual material

Episodes.Title: Three Men and a Bebe
Episodes.Plot: Cesar considers his past and the dangerous journey that brought him to Los Angeles. Amy and Kenny's marriage takes a turn for the worse, making Kenny wonder why he ever pursued Inez.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use and sexual material

Episodes.Title: Pissing in the SandBox
Episodes.Plot: Ben wants to take his company back from his daughter. A new detective causes a few upsets at the precinct. And when Eddie helps a Korean man, he finds a young girl in desperate trouble.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Future is Free
Episodes.Plot: Cesar gets a job in a car wash, while Christine learns more about Peter's departure. A K-Town rapist is questioned, Jules gives Ben a challenge, and Kenny tries to makes amends with Amy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: F-36, Sprint Left, T-4
Episodes.Plot: Kenny and Amy begin counseling. Eddie runs into more trouble as an EMT. Ben hires an MBA graduate to help him with new ideas. And Cooper thinks he has Axel right where he wants him.

Episodes.Title: Ring Dings
Episodes.Plot: Doubts are raised in the precinct when Axel is questioned about the K-Town shootings. Kenny is left holding the kids for once. And Ben learns some disturbing news about his former business partner.

Episodes.Title: The Pain Won't Stop
Episodes.Plot: Anthony and Ben visit Ben's old partner, while Eddie confronts Mr. Park. Bebe joins the search for Axel, Christine tries to re-enter the job market, and Inez crosses the line with Kenny.
